20:42|"“Yeah: Shan stole a glance at the pendulum wall clock. Eight forty-two. Eighteen minutes before he’d be escorted back. “I’m worried I left the drip hose on. If Ranger Roy gets here early
I was just thinking . . .”: tell him I’ll be back in a few.”"|The Edge of Lost|Kristina McMorris

20:42|"“Yeah: 20:42|The hand at this moment pointed to 8.42. The players took up their cards
I was just thinking . . .”: but their eyes were constantly on the clock. One may safely say that
column4: never had minutes seemed so long to them.|Around the World in Eighty Days|Jules Verne
